dublinCore.dc:title: 114 SRES 135 ATS: Making minority party appointments for the 114th Congress.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reid submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Making minority party appointments for the 114th Congress.

section.text: That the following be the minority membership on the following committee for the remainder of the 114th Congress, or until their successors are appointed:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Cardin, Mrs. Boxer, Mr. Menendez, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Coons, Mr. Udall, Mr. Murphy, Mr. Kaine, and Mr. Markey.

header.committee-name: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mrs. Shaheen, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Cardin, Ms. Heitkamp, Mr. Markey, Mr. Booker, Mr. Coons, Ms. Hirono, Mr. Peters.
